text: Carl Cecil Cain (August 2, 1934 - June 2, 2024) was an American basketball player. He competed in the 1956 Summer Olympics. Cain played college basketball for the Iowa Hawkeyes. He was a member of the United States national team, which won the Olympic gold medal in 1956. Cain died on June 2, 2024 at the age of 89.Former Hawkeye All-American Carl Cain dies at 89 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Medalists at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Military people from Illinois Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Iowa
title: Carl Cain
